title: (x) humanistic sans, similar to Rotis - TheSans {Marc O}
content:
I recently came across a face that looked a lot like Rotis... it followed a similar shape to "p", "b", "d"... it was a bit more extended, width wise... and the "&" looked like this "&" rather than the strong "et" of rotis.

it might just be another cut of rotis, but i thougt i might ask.
